parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the names of configurations in whose BOMs this component is excluded or included; null or Nothing if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swAllConfiguration or swInConfigurationOpts_e.swThisConfiguration

title: IComponent2.GetExcludeFromBOM2
description: Gets whether this component is excluded from the bills of materials (BOMs) in the specified configurations.
signature:
System.Object GetExcludeFromBOM2( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the names of configurations in whose BOMs this component is excluded or included; null or Nothing if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swAllConfiguration or swInConfigurationOpts_e.swThisConfiguration

returns: Array of values indicating whether this component is: excluded (true) from - or - included (false) in the BOMs of the specified configurations.
remarks:
This method is valid only for
table-based bills of materials
; it does not work for Microsoft Excel-based bills of materials.
